title: 无限创建*-wal和*-shm文件
content:
操作系统：windows7 x64
火狐版本：71.0 (64 位)
问题：
Firefox运行时在c:\user\*\appdata\loacal\temp文件夹下无限创建*-wal和*-shm文件（大约每两秒创建一次），大量占用C盘空间，导致系统卡顿蓝屏。
已排查：
禁用所有扩展项，无效。
重新安装各种版本，无效。

content:
I type with two different languages with my keyboard, and sometimes I forget to switch between them.
I want a simple add-on that for example changes "اثممخ" to "hello". The second language on my keyboard is Persian, but Arabic still works.
Ideally the add-on would have a textbox ...
